Study population: NewYork-Presbyterian/Columbia University Irving Medical Center (NYP/CUIMC) from Mar 1, 2020 to April 15, 2030

Study population: Columbia University Irving Medical Center (2 affiliated hospitals in Manhattan) from March 2nd to April 1st, 2020.

Title: Characteristics and outcomes of a cohort of SARS-CoV-2 patients in the Province of Reggio
Study population: All symptomatic patients who tested positive in Reggio from February 27 to April 2, 2020.

Study population: Single-center study in  New York City between March 1, 2020 and April 2, 2020, with follow up through April 7, 2022
